question: What is Chen Yufei famous for?
explanation: Chen Yufei is a Chinese badminton player. She won the girls' singles junior titles at 2016 Asian and the World Junior Championships. At the same year, Chen clinched her first senior title at the 2016 Macau Open Grand Prix Gold. She reaches a career-high as world number 1 in BWF World ranking on 17 December 2019.
